sentence.Network_en: He ordered disclosure of a medical report to the Metropolitan Police in pursuance of an investigation of murder.
sentence.Network_cn: 为配合调查一宗谋杀案，他下令向伦敦警察厅披露一份医疗报告。

sentence.Network_en: All this has been done as excuses for their continued pursuance of a policy of aggression and expansion.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一切都是为其坚持侵略扩张政策制造借口.

sentence.Network_en: He was wounded in the pursuance of his duty.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在执行任务时受了伤.

entry.def: If you do something in pursuance of a particular activity, you do it as part of carrying out that activity.

example.ex: He ordered disclosure of a medical report to the Metropolitan Police in pursuance of an investigation of murder.
example.tran: 为配合调查一宗谋杀案，他下令向伦敦警察厅披露一份医疗报告。

sentences.sentence: "life is more than the pursuance of fame"

means.word_mean: 2. the continuance of something begun with a view to its completion
